Text: I can't get the subtitles to work. I'm using MPC and K-Lite mega codec pack. Never had any problems with subs before. Any tips?
There are two tracks in subtitles.  See if your player allows you to choose the track.
any body know where i can get the dvd cover for this .. ive tried cccovers & freecover.net only getting fatal contact bird flu in america

@DeepPirate: I load the subtitles but nothing happens. All subtitle menus in the player is still grey'ed out. :/ 
Maybe I'll have to try VLC or something, but I like MPc and it never let me down before.

Move on vq, I think we're stuck without subs. On the other hand this VLC doesn't work on my PC. MPC is the best it won't let you down. I hate those subs with the *.sub extension 'cse it's so difficult to change anything in it unless you convert it to *.srt (which in fact is a normal txt file)
